EmailTemplate.subject: Live Different: WestJet Discount Code - Book Your Flights!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hey Everyone!
I just wanted to send our an email to let all of you know that WestJet has officially given Live Different volunteers a way to save on flights when travelling for a Live Different Build trip.
Please read all of the information carefully before booking!
WestJet Discount There is a potential 10% discount on flights depending on where you are travelling from and to as well as availability. The sooner you call, the better the discounts are.
How to Received a Discount We have a discount code for any flights booked through WestJet! The convention code is only for individual flights. When you use it, you have to call the WestJet Groups Department at 1-888-493-7853 and give them the convention code: CC7946.
On the phone: "Hi there, I am hoping to book an individual flight using the convention code: CC7946 to go on a Live Different Build trip."
Forwarding the Itinerary Please call as soon as possible to book your flights if you wish to receive a discount. Once you have your flights booked, please forward me your flight itinerary!
Extra Nights If you are arriving a day early or staying a day later because of flight availability, you are welcome to stay at the resort and I can book you for an extra night. It is $42 USD per night (all inclusive) for a shared room and $60 USD per night (all inclusive) for a private room.
If you have questions, please let me know.
Joy Yu
